events.title: Community Dinner
events.description: Monthly community dinner. Bring a dish to share or just come hungry. Great way to meet fellow residents.

events.title: Trail Run
events.description: Morning run on Lady Bird Trail. All paces welcome. Meet at the front gate.

events.title: Movie Night
events.description: Friday movie night in the theatre. Popcorn provided. Film TBD by vote.

events.title: Sunday Brunch
events.description: Brunch in the backyard with fresh eggs from our chickens. Weather permitting.

events.title: Open House
events.description: Tour the property and meet current residents. For prospective members.
